name: System Analyst / Business Analyst
description: Responsibilities:  Determining of business needs and requirements; Requirements elaboration and management; Operational objectives determining and sharing them with the development team; System requirement and specifications maintenance; Providing references for end users by preparing and maintaining user documentation;  Our expectations from you:  At least 2 years of experience in the field of business analysis, requirements elaboration and management; Proven record of professional experience with foreign customers; Hands-on experience with Agile methodologies, backlog, acceptance and test criteria management; Ability to work within a team environment; Good presentation and communication skills; English language at Upper-Intermediate or higher level.  We offer:  ​​​​​​Competitive salary (will be discussed with a successful candidate); Opportunities for professional and career growth; Flexible working schedule; Friendly dynamic international Agile team; Comfortable office close to Moskovskaya metro station with free shuttles; Company-paid car and bicycle parking; Fruits, snacks and fully equipped kitchens in the office; Recreational zones, play-rooms; Voluntary health insurance for employees including dental services and a doctor in the office; Training programs, including English and French classes; Opportunity to travel to professional conferences, external courses, and seminars; Help in relocating.
responsibility: Determining of business needs and requirements. Requirements elaboration and management. Operational objectives determining and sharing them with the development team.
requirement: At least 2 years of experience in the field of business analysis, requirements elaboration and management. Proven record of professional...
